about_the_game:
Create a comfy home for your hero to grow up in and a happy little village with the Shabby Cottage Tiles pack! Aqua’s latest tileset pack may call itself ‘shabby’, but the quality is anything but! Create cozy homes that belong to grandmas with doily-style rugs and flower-pattern couches, childhood bedrooms with patchwork quilts and soft sunlight streaming through lattice windows, and even relaxed villages with cobblestone paths and vines crawling up wooden walls and patio railings with this pack!

A2, A4, A5, and 3 B sheets for interiors include wooden floors and wallpapered walls to help build a comfortable place to rest. Stoves and baskets for kitchens, tubs and towel holders for bathrooms, dressers and privacy screens for bedrooms, and chaise lounges and old-school radios for living rooms are just a few of the detailed tiles you can use to make each house a unique home! Premade sets such as a couch in front of a window and a vanity with curling vines make it even easier to create a gorgeous room without having to delve into parallaxing. A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, and 3 B sheets for exteriors let you take that comfy feeling from the home into the world! Wander down simple paths to the town cafe, where wicker furniture sits for you to drink some tea and enjoy the views of colorful pink and purple leaves from the magical trees.

This pack also includes door character sprites so you can make sure players can enter all those houses you’ve lovingly created! Wooden doors with rounded tops are a perfect addition to the adorable houses you’ll make with this pack. And if that wasn’t enough, this pack also includes the beta version of this pack, meaning you have another 13 sheets to mix and match with to give houses premade garden beds and other cute additions. So if you’ve been wanting a sweet home for your hero to return to or your cozy game needs some matching cozy maps, check out the Shabby Cottage Tiles pack!

Included with this pack:

* !Doors (partial page)
* Inside_A2
* Inside_A5 (partial page)
* Inside_B
* Inside_C
* Inside_D (partial page)
* Outside_A1 (partial page)
* Outside_A2
* Outside_A3
* Outside_A4
* Outside_A5 (partial page)
* Outside_B
* Outside_C
* Outside_D (partial page)

Included within the bonus section of this pack:

* Inside_A2
* Inside_A4 (In 5 variations)
* Inside_B
* Inside_C (partial page)
* Outside_A2
* Outside_A5 (partial page)
* Outside_B
* Outside_C

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games

short_description: Add a touch of rustic elegance to your games with this cottagecore-inspired collection, filled with whimsical shabby chic furniture & accents that exude a sense of nostalgia and embrace the beauty of imperfections!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
